pages.text: Original Vampires are the first of their kindâ€”stronger, faster, and nearly immortal. They can only be killed by White Oak weapons.

pages.title: How to Become an Original Vampire
pages.text:
Perform the Ritual of the Ancients: 
- Use a Blood Altar. 
- Place a Block of Eclipsium. 
- Drink Vampire Blood. 
- Surround yourself with candles. 
- Use a dagger to cut yourself and drink the blood.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text:
- Immortal Regeneration 
- Complete Sun Immunity 
- Summon Thralls 
- Reality Shift (Phase through walls)
